OemUpdateActionNotSupported.description: The base type for an OEM extension.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

OemUpdateActionNotSupported.longDescription: This object represents the base type for an OEM object.  The resource values shall comply with the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

Message.description: Extra information for not supported action
Message.longDescription: The value of this property shall describe extra information for not supported action.

NumberOfArgs.longDescription: The value of this property shall describe how many arguments.

Resolution.longDescription: The value of this property shall describe the resolution for not supported action.

Description.longDescription: The value of this property shall describe details for not supported action.

Severity.description: severity level for not supported action
Severity.longDescription: The value of this property shall describe severity of the action.
